mapper.select: SELECT companyId, companyPw, companyName, companyNumber, companyAddress, companyZonecode, companyAddressDetail, companyContact, companyWebsite, companyEmail, companyBirth, companyEmployee, companyCreateDate, companyModifyDate, companyRole, companyImage, companyIsActive, companyProfit FROM tblCompany WHERE companyId = #{companyId}
